channel.title: [PI] Help Please [PI]
channel.description:
Okay, Guys A Few Things: *1. How Do I Find The "Commands" File And I Got A Command That Uses Certain Usernames, I Already Got 1 Name That Can Use It But I Want A 2nd Name To Use It.. How Do I Do That? *2. What Is The Object Code For 3 Different Thieving Stalls? And How Do I Put Them In My Server, How Do I Make Them Give Me $? *3. How Do I Make Items Where They Don't Tern To Dust?
BACE: Project Insanity Tragedy Pking

item.title: [PI] Help Please [PI]

just replace the first line with this. and change the names[/quote]Ty How Do I Edit The Starter Package For A PI Source??!!??

item.title: [PI] Help Please [PI]
item.dc:creator: @Abandoned_Dreams Abandoned Dreams
item.description:
@Abandoned_Dreams wrote:

[quote=“noobcoderh2o, post:2, topic:376146”]commands is commands.java
src-server-model-players-packets-commands.java

then type ctrl+f and find the command. and go to the right and ull see the names of who can use the command

what are the 3 stalls name?

go to actionhandler. and type ctrl+f and how ever much the cash gives u type that in and it will bring you up. so u can change the amount of money it gives u[/quote]Okay, For The Commands…
This Is One Of My Commands.

if (playerCommand.startsWith("ban") && c.playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("NAME1234")) { try { String playerToBan = playerCommand.substring(4); Connection.addNameToBanList(playerToBan); Connection.addNameToFile(playerToBan); for(int i = 0; i < Config.MAX_PLAYERS; i++) { if(Server.playerHandler.players[i] != null) { if(Server.playerHandler.players[i].playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(playerToBan)) { Server.playerHandler.players[i].disconnected = true; } } } I Want It To Be Where 2 Certain Names Can Use It… Not Only Mine… How Do I Do That?

Read full topic

item.title: [PI] Help Please [PI]
item.dc:creator: @noobcoderh2o noobcoderh2o
item.description:
@noobcoderh2o wrote:

commands is commands.java
src-server-model-players-packets-commands.java

then type ctrl+f and find the command. and go to the right and ull see the names of who can use the command

what are the 3 stalls name?

go to actionhandler. and type ctrl+f and how ever much the cash gives u type that in and it will bring you up. so u can change the amount of money it gives u

Read full topic
